item.title: [GROOVY-6558] incrementing a Static Compiled Map with default Integer value won't compile
item.description:
The following code:

import groovy.transform.CompileStatic

@CompileStatic
def test() {
    Map<String,Integer> frequencies = [:].withDefault { 0 }
    frequencies[ 'a' ]++
    frequencies
}

test()

    frequencies[ 'a' ] += 1

works fine
